top.title: What we know about fatal shooting of Alex Pretti by federal agents in Minneapolis
top.summary: Trump officials says federal agents shot in self-defence, as Pretti's parents accuse them of "sickening lies".

top.title: Trump says UK soldiers in Afghanistan 'among greatest of all warriors'
top.summary: The US president's praise follows his claim that allied forces avoided the front lines during the Afghanistan conflict.

top.title: Climber Alex Honnold scales 101-floor skyscraper without safety gear
top.summary: Alex Honnold has become the first person to climb the Taiwanese building alone without safety equipment.

top.title: What does a new US TikTok deal mean for users?
top.summary: While TikTok's future in the US has been secured, questions remain about exactly what changes US users will see.

top.title: Is China quietly winning the AI race?
top.summary: The BBC's Lily Jamali looks into why big US firms and start-ups alike are turning to Chinese tech.

top.title: Ubisoft cancels six games including Prince of Persia and closes studios
top.summary: The studio, known for Assassin's Creed and Just Dance, is also delaying seven titles in a restructure.

title.#text: The great e-bike crackdown has begun
The day of the second killing
Microsoft handed the government encryption keys for customer data
